definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale

sentences.english: Jam Ho is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Jam Ho and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 吳昭儀也是個平凡人，是跟你我一樣的小人物。

sentences.english: A banal landscape of ugly new towers flanks both sides.
sentences.chinese: 馬路兩遍的是平凡醜陋的新摩天大樓的景象。

sentences.english: His wife was a rather commonplace woman, of about forty-five.
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子是一個相當平凡的女人，大約四十五歲左右。

sentences.english: I will continue my future, although ordinary, but try flash look.
sentences.chinese: 我還要續寫我未來，雖然平凡，但盡閃光望。

sentences.english: But simple, unexciting answers are often the most valid.
sentences.chinese: 但是很顯然，最有效的答案往往是最平凡的。

sentences.english: I had a very normal, low-key kind of upbringing.
sentences.chinese: 我受的教育平凡而普通。

sentences.english: Mine was balky and awkward, brand new, and of a light, common color.
sentences.chinese: 我的卻碩大笨拙，簇新，顏色淺而平凡。

sentences.english: Rai Hu is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Rai Hu and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 李宥蓁也是個平凡人，是跟你我一樣的小人物。

sentences.english: And i hope could spend commonness and treacly life with you .
sentences.chinese: 並與你一起度過平凡又甜蜜的日子。

sentences.english: God uses ordinary people to do extraordinary work.
sentences.chinese: 上帝使用平凡人做不平凡的事。

sentences.english: God uses ordinary people to do extraordinary work.
sentences.chinese: 上帝使用平凡人做不平凡的事。

sentences.english: PC2, so giving a nontrivial hierarchy for the plus cupping degrees.
sentences.chinese: 從而給出了加杯計算可枚舉圖靈度的一個非平凡層譜。

sentences.english: Aya Ko is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Aya Ko and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 趙婉妤也是個平凡人，是跟你我一樣的小人物。

sentences.chinese: 林姿杏也是個平凡人，是跟你我一樣的小人物。

sentences.english: Deduce the abyss of time in the banality.
During the economic collapse, the Arab sheiks are buying extraordinary things.
sentences.chinese: 在經濟崩潰，阿拉伯酋長購買平凡的事情。

definition: ordinary and mediocre (idiom); nothing to write home about
obscure and unknown (idiom); an outsider without any reputation/a nobody/an unknown quantity
every living being (Buddhism)/the mass of common people
